org.hibernate.search.annotations

Annotation Type TikaBridge

  • Deprecated. 
    Support for Tika bridges will be removed in Hibernate Search 6. See this section of the migrationg guide.

    @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value={FIELD,METHOD})
 @Documented
 @Deprecated
public @interface TikaBridge
    Defines a bridge for integrating with Apache Tika.

    The bridge supports the following data types:

    • String - where the string value is interpreted as a file path
    • URI - where the URI is interpreted as a resource URI
    • byte[]
    • java.sql.Blob
    Author:
    Hardy Ferentschik

    • Element Detail

      • parserProvider

        public abstract Class<?> parserProvider
        Deprecated. 
        Returns:
        Class used for optionally providing a custom Tika parser. Must implement TikaParserProvider. Defaults to using an AutoDetectParser.
        Default:
        void.class

      • metadataProcessor

        public abstract Class<?> metadataProcessor
        Deprecated. 
        Returns:
        Class used for optional Tika metadata pre- and post-processing. Must implement TikaMetadataProcessor.
        Default:
        void.class

      • parseContextProvider

        public abstract Class<?> parseContextProvider
        Deprecated. 
        Returns:
        Class used for optionally providing a Tika parsing context. Must implement TikaParseContextProvider.
        Default:
        void.class
